§ 8753. Tolls and fares: payment or reimbursement Naval appropriations chargeable for transportation or travel are available for the payment or reimbursement of ferry, bridge, and similar tolls and of streetcar, bus, and similar fares. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 464, § 7523; renumbered § 8753, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 807(d)(7), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1836.)
